description: JSON schema for usage information about a single storage location.

id.description: The id of the storage location.

nodeId.description: The node that owns this location.

userId.description: The user that created or last modified this storage location.

description: The path or unique identifier to the storage.
Depending on the type, this can be the relative path,
the absolute path, full or partial URL to the storage.

storageProvider.description: Who provides the storage. Example: AWS S3, local storage.
